name: toddler
description: UI elements based on helix library

scripts.dev-tauri: clj -X:shadow:showcase:css && npx shadow-cljs -A:shadow:showcase release main --config-merge '{:output-dir "showcase/web/js" :asset-path "/js" :closure-defines {shadow.cljs.devtools.client.env.server_host "x.x.x.x"} :devtools {:use-document-host false}}'

author: Robert Gersak
